title: Glass-2-Bot
description: Architected a telerobotic system integrating Google Glass with a robot arm, enabling intuitive remote object manipulation. Leveraged Python and AI vision to translate user gaze and gestures into precise robotic actions.

modalContent.value: Architected a telerobotic system integrating Google Glass with a robot arm, enabling intuitive remote object manipulation. Leveraged Python and AI vision to translate user gaze and gestures into precise robotic actions, demonstrating a novel human-robot interface.
